docs.lead_paragraph: A selected guide to talks, walks, exhibitions, readings, celebrations and other events in New York.
docs.snippet: A selected guide to talks, walks, exhibitions, readings, celebrations and other events in New York.

docs.lead_paragraph: Roman Catholic bishops issued a proclamation on Thursday calling on believers to defend religious liberty, which they said is “under attack, both at home and abroad.”

headline.main: Catholic Bishops Urge Campaign for Religious Freedom
headline.print_headline: Catholic Bishops Urge Campaign for Religious Freedom

docs.abstract: Roman Catholic bishops issue a proclamation calling for every priest, parish and layperson to participate in a 'great national campaign' to defend religious liberty, which they characterize as being under attack.
docs.snippet: Roman Catholic bishops issued a proclamation on Thursday calling on believers to defend religious liberty, which they said is “under attack, both at home and abroad.”

docs.abstract: Banks' out-of-control risk-taking and the government's failure to rein them in created many problems, which critics of government spending are now using as an excuse to attack Medicare, an economist writes.
docs.snippet: Banks' out-of-control risk-taking and the government's failure to rein them in created many problems, which critics of government spending are now using as an excuse to attack Medicare, an economist writes.

docs.lead_paragraph: On Thursday — the actual anniversary of Mitt Romney’s signing of the Massachusetts law — the state’s Democratic Party will hold a “birthday party” for the law, complete with a cake and punch.

headline.seo: Massachusetts Health Law Is Celebrated, With a Poke at Romney
headline.main: Celebrating Health Law, With a Poke at Romney
headline.print_headline: Celebrating Health Law, With a Poke At Romney

docs.abstract: Massachusetts Democratic Party will hold a birthday celebration for the state's landmark health care law, which was signed by then-Gov Mitt Romney six years ago; leaders call for Romney to be proud of his accomplishment, which has been a serious political liability during his campaign for the Republican presidential nomination.
docs.snippet: On Thursday — the actual anniversary of Mitt Romney’s signing of the Massachusetts law — the state’s Democratic Party will hold a “birthday party” for the law, complete with a cake and punch.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some entrepreneurial doctors and patients have come up with Web sites and mobile apps to ease monitoring of a person’s vital signs and even make appointments.

headline.seo: Start-Ups Use Technology in Patient-Doctor Relations
headline.main: Vital Signs by Phone, Then, With a Click, a Doctor’s Appointment
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs by Phone, Then, With a Click, A Doctor’s Appointment

docs.abstract: Entrepreneurs are starting health care technology companies that change the way Americans interact with the system, responding to an evolving model of health care and bringing patient care and health insurance into the digital age.
docs.snippet: Some entrepreneurial doctors and patients have come up with Web sites and mobile apps to ease monitoring of a person’s vital signs and even make appointments.

docs.abstract: An interview with Nicholas R. Lardy, an authority on China and its economy, about his book "Sustaining China's Economic Growth After the Global Financial Crisis."
docs.snippet: An interview with Nicholas R. Lardy, an authority on China and its economy, about his book "Sustaining China's Economic Growth After the Global Financial Crisis."

headline.main: Weighing the Evidence on Fish Oils for Heart Health

docs.abstract: Taking omega-3 fatty acids does not reduce the risk of further cardiovascular problems in people with heart disease, a new analysis has found, and it's still unclear whether they help those with healthy hearts.
docs.snippet: Taking omega-3 fatty acids does not reduce the risk of further cardiovascular problems in people with heart disease, a new analysis has found, and it's still unclear whether they help those with healthy hearts.

headline.main: Reminders of Romney's Comments, From the Obama Camp

docs.abstract: With a new video, the Obama campaign is working to remind voters of the things Mitt Romney said during the primary.
docs.snippet: With a new video, the Obama campaign is working to remind voters of the things Mitt Romney said during the primary.

headline.main: For Santorum, a Hard Road to Harmony With Romney

docs.abstract: For months, Rick Santorum has provided searing critiques of Mitt Romney's character and record. Before long, he will have to forget all that and endorse his opponent.
docs.snippet: For months, Rick Santorum has provided searing critiques of Mitt Romney's character and record. Before long, he will have to forget all that and endorse his opponent.
